about_the_game:
The Legendary Martial Art Returns…!

Han Mingtang, a lowly servant in the Yunu Clan, spends his days attending to the sect’s female disciples, devoid of status and constantly humiliated. One day, he hears whispers of an ancient martial arts manual hidden within the sect’s forbidden cave. Driven by desperation, he risks his life to uncover the truth.

The cave is dark and damp, filled with the scent of decay. Water drips eerily, echoing through the cavern as if whispering unseen dangers. Step by step, he ventures deeper until an ancient stone altar emerges from the shadows.

Resting atop the altar is a worn, yellowed tome. Though its cover is faded, a few bold characters remain clearly visible—

“Xue Wang Quan” (穴王拳).

【Game Features】────────────────────────────────────────────▣

  • Enhanced Acupoint Combat – Master the Art of Precision!Strike with precision, plan your moves, and outmaneuver your foes! With even stronger opponents this time, can you fully grasp the power of Xue Wang Quan and dominate the battlefield?

  • A Stunning New Roster of CharactersThis time, even more captivating women await your conquest! From the gentle and obedient maid, the tsundere junior disciple, to the enigmatic and alluring sect leader—each one with her own secrets waiting to be unraveled!

  • Puzzle & AVG – A New Level of Excitement!Experience the perfect blend of classic acupoint gameplay and engaging AVG storytelling. Face challenging stages, unlock tantalizing new plotlines, and navigate a journey that tests both your wits and desires!

  • A Visually Stunning ExperienceDelicate brushstrokes, soft hues, and breathtaking watercolor-style visuals bring every scene to life! With more refined character designs and smoother animations, immerse yourself in a world like never before!

  • HCG Gallery – Relive Every Unforgettable Moment!Missed a scene? No worries! Revisit every exquisite CG anytime you want, ensuring that your most thrilling encounters are always within reach!

  • One-Click Control – Effortless Enjoyment!Simple one-click gameplay lets you free up your other hand—so you can fully indulge in the romance of the martial world without distractions!

【How To Play】─────────────────────────────────────────────▣

  • Game Objective: Time your shots perfectly and launch your fingers into open slots on the spinning wheel. Reach the target count to clear the level!

  • Firing Mechanism: Click anywhere on the left side of the screen to launch a finger.

  • Reward System: Earn a heart after clearing each stage. If you miss, you’ll lose a heart, but the target count will also decrease, making it easier to progress!

  • Tip: You can replay completed levels to accumulate extra hearts!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked , sexual acts or pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old

name: Re: GSpot Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: The sequel to "GSpot Master" is here! To escape his life of servitude, Han Mingtang discovers the legendary GSpot Master. No longer a mere servant, he rises to conquer the Yunu Clan! Time your strikes, and charm fierce martial beauties! Can you master your fate and become the true GSpot Master?
